name: Arcadian Rift
storyline: Take on the role of a pirate in a star system devoid of government and laws. Use your ship and tech to scan for passing cargo ships to raid for loot. Use this loot to build an arsenal of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to hunt down the four rogue AI which have conquered the system.
summary: Fight as a space pirate in this sci-fi FPS adventure where you raid ships and gather an arsenal of weapons, gadgets, and upgrades to build your character. Use your gear to hunt down and destroy the four rogue AI who have conquered and occupy this lawless star system.
